youtube.title: 3.1 YouTube Data API
youtube.content: The App uses the YouTube Data API v3 to manage your playlists. It is not affiliated with YouTube or Google. We do not collect, store, or refresh any YouTube API data on our servers. Operations such as adding, deleting, and updating playlists are executed via the YouTube API to enable playlist management.

spotify.content: The App uses the Spotify Web API to manage your Spotify playlists and content. It is not affiliated with Spotify. No Spotify API data is collected, stored, or refreshed on our servers. Features include playlist creation, tracking, management, and music discovery.
